name: Skylight
body:
### Welcome to Skylight Pages. Skylight is the easiest, simplest API to create bots in [Everybody Edits](http://everybodyedits.com/). It supports quickly connecting to EE via Kongregate, Facebook, or EverybodyEdits; joining levels; receiving information from levels through a simple event system; and performing actions in a level. It is written in C# and supports any .NET language in the 4.0 or higher framework. static Room R = new Room("PWjThDaofKbEI"); static Bot B = new Bot(R, "email", "pass"); static void main() B.Join(); ### Authors and Contributors Creator: @Seist (Tako) Major help from: @Decagon
Minor help from: @kevin-brown, gustav9797 ### Support or Contact Need help using Skylight? Check out the [forum page](http://ee.forumify.com/viewtopic.php?pid=460969#p460969) to see a quick guide and some FAQs. Alternatively, you can read the [wiki](https://github.com/Seist/Skylight/wiki) for even more. You can also email me at takoman02.ee@gmail.com or contact me via [tumblr](http://cotku.tumblr.com/ask).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
